InfluenceRule.name: People who aren't shy are more direct
honest people more likely to ask out
Proving a point about not being shallow by dating unattractive person
Dating an unattractive person in spite of my friends
History of romance makes more likely to ask out
Recent romance
Nice history from r makes a little more likely to ask out
Past action of taboo makes less likely to ask out
Swingers are apparently into gross people
If you're afraid of commitment you might not ask someone out
This instant is the best if you've previously dated someone.
A little more likely to date someone who has things you want
More likely to date someone you have a lot in common with
Likely to date someone who has been romantic to you
Unikely to date someone who has been mean to you (unless you like it that way)
Less likely to date taboo people (unless you're oblivious)
If you have a crush, most people likely to respond to sincerity vs crassness
Confused people less likely to accept offer
Popular people less likely to accept blatant public offer from unpopular people
Inarticulate people more likely to appreciate straightforward offer rather than verbal play
People who take things slowly more likely to want a history of romantic behavior
Someone scared of a third party more likely to want a nice realtionship

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %r% totally shot %i% down
%list(i,r,and)% built a relationship around %CKB_((i,likes),(r,likes),())%s
%i% reminded %r% of romance to kindle a relationship
%i% asked %r% out
%list(i,r,and)% failed to build a relationship around %CKB_((i,likes),(r,likes),())%s
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% too popular to be seen dating %i%
%r% %pron(r,was/were)%n't into %i% enough to date %pron(i,him/her)%
even though %r% %pron(r,was/were)% way out of %ip% league, %prons(i,he/she)% totally convinced %pron(r,him/her)% to go out with %pron(i,him/her)%
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% totally into %i% and so %prons(i,he/she)% totally asked %pron(r,him/her)% out
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% totally checking %i% out but %pron(r,was/were)% too shy to do anything about it
%list(i,r,and)% made it out of the friend zone
%i% made things awkward with %r% by trying to ask %pron(r,him/her)% out
%i% didn't let a simple thing like mutual hatred get in the way of %pron(i,his/her)% plans to date %r%
%i% thought %r% would go out with %pron(i,him/her)% for some reason
%r% made a lame excuse to avoid going on a date with %i%
%r% set some conditions for going out on a date with %i%
%i% %pron(i,was/were)% too shy to ask %r% out but %rs% said yes anyway
%i% reminded %r% of %pron(i,his/her)% total awesomeness and %list(i,r,we/they)% started dating
%i% reminded %r% of %pron(i,his/her)% total awesomeness but %rs% didn't buy it
%i% tried to ask some shadow from %pron(i,his/her)% past out on a date
%o% saw future visions of %list(i,r,and)% totally making out
%r% shut down %ip% attempt to ask %pron(r,him/her)% out
%i% asked %r% out even though %prons(i,he/she)% %pron(i,was/were)%n't the strongest %gender(i,guy,girl)% around
%i% %pron(i,was/were)% like 'we should date' and %r% %pron(r,was/were)% like 'ew'
%i% got with %op% %gender(r,boyfriend,girlfriend)%
%i% got shut down by %o% when trying to get with %pron(o,his/her)% %gender(r,bf,gf)%
%i% got back together with %r%
%i% tried to get back together with %r% but it wasn't meant to be
%i% drifted back into a relationship with %r%
%i% tried to get back together with %r% but %prons(r,he/she)% %pron(r,was/were)%n't interested
%i% tried to get back together with %r% and it was kinda pathetic
%i% got back together with %r% after a recent break-up
%i% got rejected by %r% for trying to get back together so soon
%i% begged %r% back after cheating on %pron(r,him/her)%
%i% got rejected by %r% for being a begging cheater
%i% got back with %pron(i,his/her)% traitorous ex
%i% pathetically failed to beg %pron(i,his/her)% traitorous ex back
%i% got all 'it's complicated' with %list(r,o,and)%
%r% refused to cheat on %o% and date %i%
%r% tragically refused to cheat on %o% and date %i%
%list(i,r,and)% got into some weird triangle thing with %o%
%i% tried to get %r% into some weird 'it's complicated' relationship with %o%
%list(i,r,and)% became more than friends

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Generic TrueLove Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Do you want to, like, go out with me or whatever?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Yeah sure. That's cool.,Well... okay!,I guess we could try it.,Why not?,I'd love to.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(GREAT!,COOL!,AWESOME!,EXCELLENT!)% I mean, yeah, %positiveadj% and stuff.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Generic TrueLove Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, hey! %r%! Uh... I was thinking...
Do you want to, like, date or whatever?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ....%random(I'll take whatever,Thanks but no thanks,In your dreams,How about no)%.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Past Romance Ask on Date

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, remember when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. Like it was yesterday.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know... if we were dating, we could do things like that all the time.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You don't say... hey, are you doing anything later?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I thought you'd never ask, %sweetie%.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Similar Interests Ask Out Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%... uh... I was thinking...
We have so much in common... I mean... you like %toc1%s, I like %toc1%s... it's like we're made for each other!
So like... do you want to go out?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well... I *am* really into %toc1%s...
%random(Sure!,Sounds great!,Let's do it!,Okay!)%

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Similar Interests Ask Out Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%... uh... I was thinking...
We have so much in common... I mean... you like %toc1%s, I like %toc1%s... it's like we're made for each other!
So like... do you want to go out?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well... I *am* really into %toc1%s...
...but I hardly think two people could really build like a solid, healthy relationship around that. Do you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...I guess not.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Not Popular Enough Ask Out Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, hey! %r%! Uh... I was thinking...
Do you want to, like, %random(date or whatever,go out,start dating,get into like a relationship,be my significant other)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I kind of only should be seen dating, you know. Popular people.
You understand I'm sure.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Low Romance Ask Out Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, hey! %r%! Uh... I was thinking...
Do you want to, like, date or whatever?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sorry, %i%. I just don't really think of you in that way.
You're more like... %if(0,a friend)elseif(1,an enemy)else(an acquaintance)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I see.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - R TOO Popular Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... What's up! ...uh.... hello?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, are you talking to me? Sorry, I was just texting some of my trendsetter friends. Did you want something?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... probably not.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Spit it out.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well look... I know I'm not the most popular %gender(i,guy,girl)% in school. But... I really think you're amazing, and %gender(r,super hot,totally cute)%. Do you... do you want to go out?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well... it's a little unheard of. I mean, what would people *say*?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Forget them. If I like you and you like me, what else matters?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's refreshingly naive, but you *are* pretty cute. Oh, what the hey, let's try it!

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - High ROM (r->i) Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So... %r%... I know you've been checking me out hard lately.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What!? %i%... I... Uh... You know.... Erm...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's okay %sweetie%. Don't worry about it. I was wondering though, you wanna go out?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you kidding!? OF COURSE! I'm going to text ALL MY FRIENDS about this RIGHT NOW!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Heh, ain't no big thing babe.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - High ROM (r->i) Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You don't think I know what you're doing?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...Erm, uh... huh?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: The notes? Locker gifts? The looks and glances? I know you're %positiveadj% into me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... errr... I....
omg omg omg omg omg

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So like... Do you want to go out with me?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: SAY YES! SAY YES! SAY YES! SAY YES!
Err... uhhhhhh... I......

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well okay, whatever %r%. Let me know when you want to get real about this thing.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: So stupid! So stupid! Why what arrgggghghh....

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Friends Accept

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey bud~ What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: 'Bud'... Heh... Yeah... I've been thinking about that a lot lately.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you mean? Do you not like me calling you 'bud'?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No no! You can call me anything you want! But we've been friends for a while now, what do you think about taking this relationship to the next level?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't quite follow...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I mean... You could call me 'bud'. Or you could, perhaps, call me '%sweetie%'...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh. OHhhhh.. Yeah, okay. Sure!

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Friends Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. You know, I've been thinking... We've been pretty good friends, huh?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I guess so. Why? What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I dunno, I was just kinda thinking, maybe we should, like, go out or stuff.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Go out? Whoa %gender(i,man,girl)%. I don't date my friends. Who do you think I am? Some sort of cheap fling?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No! It's just that like, you know, I was hoping we could take this relationship to the next level...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: 'Next LEVEL'?! What do you think this is, some sort of video-game? No way. I don't work like that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh... Okay. Still friends though right?

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Enemies Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %pejorative%. Your face is stupid.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not as stupid as yours.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I hate you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What a coincidence. I hate you too.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I hate you even more because I find you mildly attractive.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: God you're hot when you're angry.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Instead of mildly, I meant extremely.
We should be dating.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: This is a terrible idea that we are both going to regret.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I regret it already.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Me too, %sweetie%.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Enemies Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Okay, I know we're sworn enemies and everything. But I had a crazy idea.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You've got five seconds before I stop caring.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Maybe our hatred spills from an unstoppable wellspring of mutual lust that we've both just been denying. We should go out!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Andddd your five seconds are up.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Come on %r%! Wouldn't it be cool?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sorry, I couldn't date someone who doesn't understand the concept of 'time'.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ugh! You %pejorative%. I'M PUTTING THE STOPPER BACK ON MY WELLSPRING!

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Random Make up an excuse.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. Do you want to go %random(out to the movies,up to makeout point,make fun of Canadians,to that concert,to a play,mullet hunting)% with me tonight?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ummm, I totally would but %random(my dog died,I have irritable bowel syndrome,my house got flooded,I can't miss another episode of Fun Cuddly Make Believe Creatures,I have all this hair that needs constant washing)%. Maybe next time.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sure... I'll just be over there, %random(crying in the corner,imagining us together,asking my imaginary friends if they would go instead,dieing inside)%.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Dominating Responder Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%. How would you like to %random(watch that new movie *Battlefield Switzerland*,go out to the *EastHouse Mall*,sit around and eat *Chocoveggies*,go to my house and watch *ninja movies*)% together?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, but only if %random(I get to pick the time and place,you wear only clothes from *Mariano*,you arrive exactly on time)% and %random(everything is prepared perfectly beforehand,you don't speak unless spoken to,you comment positively on any physical trait of mine every 10 minutes)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Umm, okay.
%random(What did I get myself into?, I hope this turns out okay..., Just breathe and hope this isn't how it will always be.)%

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Introverted Random Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uhh, hey %r%. %random(Do you.. uh, .., Would you like to.... umm, Yeah.., You and I could...uhhh, ....Um)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You shy %gender(i,boy,girl)%... %random(you're totally trying to ask me out aren't you, are you asking me out)%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(Yeah..., Uhhh yeah., ...., Does that mean yes?, I think...)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Okay hot stuff, you're on.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Introverted & Cool accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, do you want to, like, go on a date or something?
I mean, I tend to be pretty cool and stuff. Remember when %toc1%... That was pretty cool... right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It was kind of cool. And I am sort of into you... sure!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh... okay, haha, great!

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Introverted & Cool reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey... so like, do you want to date... or something?
I mean, I tend to be pretty cool and stuff... Like that one time when %toc1%... that was pretty cool.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It was... kind of cool... I suppose...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Haha, yeah...
So... about that date.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'd stop thinking about it if I were you...

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - (SS8 Act-2) Scrooge meets the ghost of Christmas Past

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I've been thinking, and... I think maybe we should get back together.
I've been really missing you, and, well actually %o% was prattling on about some mumbo-jumbo re: my immortal soul.
But, heh, maybe my soul could use a mate, eh? Eh?
Oh, come on, that was really sweet!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You fear the world too much.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ExCUSE me? How did you get that from me asking you out?
%o%! Get outta here! I'm trying to work the magic with %r%!
LineOfDialogue.otherLine: She cannot hear you. This is a simple shade, a shadow of your memory.
Again, she cannot hear you. And I am not %o%. I am the Ghost of Christmas Past, assuming the visage of your dear friend.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: All your other hopes have merged into the hope of being beyond the chance of the world's sordid reproach.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Man... I really don't remember having this conversation...
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I have seen your nobler aspirations fall off one by one, until the master-passion, Gain, engrosses you.
Have I not?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No more, Spirit! I don't wish to see any more of this weirdness! Show me no more!

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: That these shadows are what they are, do not blame me!

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - (SS8 Act-4) The Ghost of Christmas Future

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Spirit! Reveal yourself! Make your presence known!
What... is this.. this is the shape of things to come?
I drove %pron(r,him/her)% away, and %pron(r,he/she)% found solace in my best friend.
Oh, spirit! Are these shadows of things that Will be, or are they shadows of things that May be, only?
Good Spirit! Assure me that I yet may change these shadows you have shown me, by an altered life.
I will honour Christmas in my heart, and try to keep it all the year. I'll also try to patch things up with %r%.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Cold r is so not into this weakling!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So... what would you think if I, like, asked you out?
Oh, I uh, guess I'll talk to you later...

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - r can deal with with dating such a weakling

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I may not be much in the muscles department, but I know what I like, and I like you. What do you say? Will you be my %gender(r,boy,girl)%friend?
Come on!

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Maybe frenemies Can't date

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: We're getting lunch.
Like, on a date.
We're going on a date.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - I is enemies with O, O is dating R, I wants to get with O - Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey there %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting% %i%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You wanna go out some time, like on a date?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm kind of going out with %o%...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, but %o% doesn't have to know that you are going out with someone else.
Even though %pron(o,he/she)% is my enemy I will *try* to not tell %pron(o,him/her)% that I asked you out.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Fine, I hope this is worth it.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - I is enemies with O, O is dating R, I wants to get with O - Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You wanna go out on a date?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm kind of going out with %o%...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, but %o% doesn't have to know though.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: I don't have to know what?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just asking your lovely %gender(r,boyfriend,girlfriend)% out on a harmless date. What are you going to do about it %o%?

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: I'm sure %pron(r,he/she)% isn't interested in your silly dates.
Come on %r%, let's just leave %pron(i,him/her)% here. Alone.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Get Back Together High romance accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%... I've been thinking.
Maybe we should get back together again.
Now before you say anything, hear me out.
I realize we've had our ups and downs.
But the more time goes by, the more I realize... we were meant to be together.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't know what to say.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Then don't say anything.
Just kiss me.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Get Back Together High romance reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%... I've been thinking.
Maybe we should get back together again.
Now before you say anything, hear me out.
I realize we've had our ups and downs.
But the more time goes by, the more I realize... we were meant to be together.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: We tried that once, and you know how that turned out.
%if(0,I'm with someone else now and I won't just throw that away.)else(I've moved on. I'm a different person now.)%
I still care about you a lot, but... we had our chance, and... and we blew it.
I'm sorry. It's just not meant to be.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Get Back Together Generic romance accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%... I've been thinking.
Maybe we should get back together again.
Now before you say anything, hear me out.
I realize we've had our ups and downs.
But the more time goes by, the more I realize... we were meant to be together.
Wow, that was easy.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Get Back Together Generic romance reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%... I've been thinking.
Maybe we should get back together again.
Now before you say anything, hear me out.
I realize we've had our ups and downs.
But the more time goes by, the more I realize... we were meant to be together.
What, that's it? 'Nah?' That's all the consideration I get?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Pretty much.
We're through, %i%. Deal.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Get Back Together low romance reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%... I've been thinking.
Maybe we should get back together again.
Now before you say anything, hear me out.
I realize we've had our ups and downs.
But the more time goes by, the more I realize... we were meant to be together.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Look, %i%.
You need to get over me.
We are not getting back together again. Not now, not ever.
I don't know how to make that any more clear.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - (Zane) GetBackTogethers Accept Non Cheat

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh! %i%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%... So, I've been kinda feeling like something's been missing lately.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, really? Y... yeah. Me too.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Wanna like, maybe, try again? You know, the two of us?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure! I mean... Yeah, I guess.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Cool! I mean, %positiveadj%...

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - (Zane) GetBackTogethers Reject Non Cheat

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%... %sweetie%...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, it's you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I've been thinking a lot lately, and I just feel kinda empty. Like I'm missing something.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're talking about me, aren't you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ... Yes.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well! Keep thinking. Because it ain't gonna happen.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - (Zane) GetBackTogethers Accept (cheat i, r)

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I need you back. I'll do anything. Please. Come back to me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Come *back* to you!? Are you crazy!? You cheated on me with %o%!
I wouldn't come back to you even if you paid me!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Please... You were everything to me. I still love you! I made a mistake! I can change!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You can change, huh?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes! Honest... I just... I need you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh %r%... Fine. You're still on thin ice though.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - (Zane) GetBackTogethers Reject (cheat i, r)

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%. You know, I was thinking...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? What could you possibly be thinking? Not like I wanna know.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I miss you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, what's the matter? %o% wasn't good enough for you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I made a mistake alright, can't we just forgive and forget?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: OH RIGHT! Because I *totally* forgot about how you tore my heart to pieces. You cheating %pejorative%!
DIE. IN. A. FIRE.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - (Zane) GetBackTogethers Accept (cheat r,i)

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I want you back, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you serious?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't care that we had our differences. I don't care that you cheated on me.
You're everything to me. I want you back.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't know, %i%... I might break your heart again.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: If it's you, %r%... I don't mind.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - (Zane) GetBackTogethers Reject (cheat r, i)

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I need you back %r%, you're just a part of me I can't reject.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? Seriously? I cheated on you, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It doesn't matter! We all make mistakes! Please, take me back!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Absolutely not! Don't you get what kind of person I am? I'll only hurt you more.
Look, %i%. I'm just not the type of %gender(r,guy,girl)% you really need.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I see...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Good-luck to you.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out Swinger Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%... I know you're dating %o%, but... you're the light of my life, the fire in my eyes. I can't stop thinking about you. You're my everything.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%... I've been waiting for you to say something. I feel the same way about you. We were meant to be.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Really? Oh %sweetie%, I'm so happy.
But... what about %o%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, don't worry about %gender(o,him,her)%. I feel certain that three people as mature as we all are will be able to negotiate a complex relationship.
I mean, we are high school seniors, after all.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out Reject - i is dating o and r is offended

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I have a proposition for you. Hear me out.
I know you're dating %o%, but you need someone who really understands you and cares about you, too.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Someone like you, is that it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... sure! What do you think?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: First of all, no I will not date you.
Second, I'm offended you even asked. You think I would just cheat on %o%? I'm not that kind of person, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But... I thought...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No. The answer is no.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out Reject - i is dating o and r is torn

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I have a proposition for you. Hear me out.
I know you're dating %o%, but I you need someone who really understands you and cares about you, too.
Someone... like me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%. I would be lying if I said I didn't sometimes wonder whether we could be together.
But I just can't right now. I'm with %o%, and I couldn't cheat on %pron(o,him/her)%. It just wouldn't be right.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But %sweetie%, we're so right for each other! Can't you see we were meant to be together?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Stop it. Just stop. We can't. We just can't, okay?
You should go.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'll always be here if... if you change your mind.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out Accept Threeway

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, %r%... I'm dating %o%... you're dating %o%.
Wouldn't it be so much easier if you and I were to start dating, too?
Not to mention hotter.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...sure, I guess we could try it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %positiveadj%! ...%sweetie%.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out Reject Threeway

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, %r%... I'm dating %o%... you're dating %o%.
Wouldn't it be so much easier if you and I were to start dating, too?
Not to mention hotter.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...can't imagine anything you could have said that would have disgusted me more.
Please die.

Instantiation.name: Ask Out - Recent romantic friends Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... um... I've been thinking about what happened earlier. When %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, I'm so sorry %i%. I shouldn't have said anything. I'm so embarrassed.
Look, it's okay if you don't want to be friends any more.... I understand.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! Just listen for a minute!
I still want to be friends with you. You're %positiveadj%, %r%. I...
I want to be more than friends.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I... I don't know what to say...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Then kiss me.
